name: JJ Hiew
title: Co-Founder, Tech & Dev
description: Formerly the CTO of Merscient Inc., JJ has launched global online platforms for numerous clients including IBM, GE, and Castrol Wakefield. He has 10 years of experience as a software developer & solutions architect. JJ graduated from UofT with a B.Sc in Computer Science.

name: Ben Zelikovitz
title: Co-founder, Sales & Operations
description:
Ben is a Director at Sitescout and has 10+ years of experience in Enterprise SaaS sales and operations.  Prior to that, Ben was a Recruiting Manager for Randstad Canada's technology division.

His hero is Drake.

name: Trevor Zeyl
title: Co-founder, Legal
description: Trevor is an Corporate lawyer for the prestigious Norton Rose Fulbright LLP. He is currently trapped inside his firm's boardroom.
